After a long journey, the dragon arrived to his destination. Although he had 
never seen it or heard of it, he knew that this was Cybertronian Fire, the 
maximal's base. He could not say why, he just felt it in his spark...

AzureBlade:
So this is where my fellow Maximals have established... Nice design!
But the main thing is that I have found them!

He transformed to his robot mode and landed in front of the base.

AzureBlade:
(His voice was louder because of the echo)
Fellow Maximals! My name is AzureBlade and I wish to join you in your fight 
against the Predacons!
